title: Sexual References and Innuendos
description: Any references or jokes about sex, flirting, innuendos, etc.

title: Childish Language
description: Generally, things you would not want your 3-year-old to repeat.

title: Racial Slurs and Bigoted Language
description: Racist, sexist, and/or discriminatory language in any form.

title: Non-Graphic
description: Violence without blood.

title: Graphic
description: Violence with blood or breaking bones.

title: Disturbing Images
description: Dead bodies, severed body parts, or object protruding from body

title: Gore
description: Gore, bloody guts, bloody severed body parts.

title: Implied Violence
description: The violence is not seen on screen. Graphic descriptions or details of a violent act.

title: Immodesty
description: Bikinis, focused chest shots, or bare midriffs for women. Formfitting underwear, breifs, or speedos for men.

title: Nudity (without sex)
description: Skinny dipping, bathing, flashing, mooning, etc.

title: Statues and Paintings
description: Art, statues, mannequins, drawings, stained glass, reliefs, etc.

title: Implied Nudity
description: Not wearing clothing but private areas are hidden.

title: Sexually Suggestive
description: Behaviors with action or sexual undertones enticing or implying sexual intent.

title: Normal Kissing
description: Lip-to-lip kissing.

title: Passionate Kissing
description: French kissing, making out, or sensually kissing parts of the body.

title: Implied Sex
description: When sex happens off-screen, or immediately before/after

title: Sexual Assault
description: Rape, attempted rape, bestiality, etc. References to rape or molestation.

title: Sex without Nudity
description: Sex with a discreet camera angle, under bedsheets, etc.

title: Sex with Nudity
description: Sex shown with any body part that would normally be covered by a bikini or Speedo.

title: Legal Use
description: Legal drinking/smoking

title: Implied Use
description: All discussion, handling, making, and visibility of illegal drugs and underage drinking/smoking

title: Illegal Use
description: Consumption of illegal drugs and underage drinking/smoking, including in the background.

title: Bodily Functions/Jokes
description: Gross bodily fluids/functions such as a person passing gas. Nosebleeds and such that are not from violence. Potty talk.

title: Objectionable/Disturbing/Scary
description: Violent seizures, condoms, tattoo needles etc.

title: Vulgar Gestures
description: Crotch-grabbing, gestures for profanities, mimicking any sex act, etc.

title: Medical - Graphic
description: Medical procedures where blood, organs, or anything gross is shown.

title: Medical - Procedures
description: Vaccines and medical shots when the needle penetrates the skin. Doctor procedures that do not include blood.

title: Life Events
description: Death by natural/non-violent causes. Birth, labor, and contractions if anything is seen or when they start giving birth.
